amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent any provisions of the bill from going into effect if any agriculture, agriculture-related, fishery, or fishery-related job is lost North of the Sacramento-San Joaquin River Delta.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-405 to prevent several provisions of this Act from going into effect if any agriculture, agriculture-related, fishery, or fishery-related job is lost North of the Sacramento-San Joaquin River Delta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 239 (Roll no. 83).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 239 (Roll no. 83).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
